overview:
## Discussion

Provide the identifier, stored in the [doc://com.apple.bundleresources/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/UILaunchScreens/UILaunchScreenDefinitions/UILaunchScreenIdentifier] key, of one of the launch screen definitions in your [doc://com.apple.bundleresources/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/UILaunchScreens/UILaunchScreenDefinitions] array. The system displays the named launch screen when launching your app in response to a URL scheme that you don’t enumerate in the [doc://com.apple.bundleresources/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/UILaunchStoryboards/UIURLToLaunchStoryboardAssociations] dictionary, or when the user launches your app directly.

# UIDefaultLaunchScreen

**Property List Key**

The default launch screen configuration.

## Discussion

Provide the identifier, stored in the [doc://com.apple.bundleresources/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/UILaunchScreens/UILaunchScreenDefinitions/UILaunchScreenIdentifier] key, of one of the launch screen definitions in your [doc://com.apple.bundleresources/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/UILaunchScreens/UILaunchScreenDefinitions] array. The system displays the named launch screen when launching your app in response to a URL scheme that you don’t enumerate in the [doc://com.apple.bundleresources/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/UILaunchStoryboards/UIURLToLaunchStoryboardAssociations] dictionary, or when the user launches your app directly.

## Associations

- **UIURLToLaunchScreenAssociations**: The mapping of URL schemes to launch screen configurations.

items.description: The mapping of URL schemes to launch screen configurations.
